sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  import { withRouter } from 'next/router'
import BlogPost from '../../components/layouts/blog-post'
export const meta = {
  published: true,
  publishedAt: '2018-05-18',
  title: 'Deploy to Now',
  summary:
    'One of the most amazing things about this project is that you can easily deploy it to Now',
  image: '/static/site-feature.png',
}
export default ({components, ...props}) => <MDXTag name="wrapper" Layout={withRouter(({ children, router }) => (
  <BlogPost path={router.pathname} meta={meta}>
    {children}
  </BlogPost>
))} layoutProps={props} components={components}>


<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`One of the amazing things about this project is that you can easily deploy it to Now.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`The time from cloning the repository to deploy and preview your blog online can be of a couple minutes.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Also, you can see exactly how it will look in production using `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"https://zeit.co/blog/now-dev"}}>{`now dev`}</MDXTag></MDXTag></MDXTag>
